text: Jose Portugal Perez (December 14, 1946 â€“ August 12, 2021) was a Filipino lawyer and politician. He was the Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines from 2009 until 2016, after being nominated by President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo. He was born in Batangas City, Philippines. Perez died on August 12, 2021 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Batangas Category:Filipino judges
title: Jose P. Perez
